707265f-a.title: Brooklyn: Warren St. - Columbia St.
707265f-a.text:
Warren Street, east from and across Columbia Street. The second building on the left is the Hills Brothers stable. Across its roof is the spire of St. Peters Roman Catholic Church, at Hicks Street, and beyond that is St. Peters Hospitnl.
October 15, 1940
P. L. Sperr
707265f-a.folder: Warren St. & Columbia St., Brooklyn, NY
